actions-list.actionItem: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.
Considered by unanimous consent. H. Res. 1626 â€” "The title of this measure is not available."
Without objection, the Chair laid before the House H. Res. 1626.

actions-list.header: United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission
actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to section 1238(b)(3) of the Floyd D. Spence National Defense Authorization Act of Fiscal Year 2001 (22 U.S.C. 7002), as amended, the Democratic Leader appointed Ms. Reva B. Price, Chevy Chase, MD, effective January 1, 2025.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Patrick T. McHenry to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
